EmailTemplate.name: Buying Power Campaign
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Business Account with Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As a member of a GPO, you are entitled to the Buying Power benefits negotiated exclusively for you through your Office Depot business account. I am calling on behalf of your account manager and we want to make sure you are getting the full benefit of the program.
Benefits include: • Discounted pricing through leveraging the collective buying power of the Group Purchasing buying group • Access to a dedicated Account Manager, as well as Furniture, Technology Cleaning and Breakroom, and Copy & Print specialists • Take full advantage of discounts by shopping online or in store • free next day delivery
Charles Delbrey is your dedicated Office Depot Business Account Manager.
He will provide excellent customer service and be a great resource for you. Feel free to give Charles a call.
Charles Delbrey Office Depot Business Account Manager 855-337-6811 ext 12671 charles.delbrey@officedepot.com
